column5: My dad was trying to think of the name of this certain comedian, but he can't seem to remember.  This is the description of the guy:    Can anybody think of who this is???
so I guess it's not Jackie Mason or Don rickles
Lewis Black dont think hes dead thou
Sam Kinison it is...thanks Musky or Specs.
def. sam kinnison, i think he was killed in a car wreck.  jason
Here's another obnoxious comedian from about the same era:  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0-afZZulNoU
No problem glad I could help if theres one thing my brain is good for its storing absolutely useless information.
Dayum! I was out fishin' when you posted. Sam Kinison, the guy I hated to admit made me chuckle.  JF
I dunno who you are asking about but I do know that Jackie Mason is still alive.
Sam it is..He was a blast back in the day when he was on Howard Stern. Joe
He wasn't really my cup of tea...but apparently he was and is considered one of the true innovators and a real genius by other professional comedians.

He was one of the greats Sam was an original and that is what I respected about him. Some may like him and some may not but his stuff was his and not ripped off which is very rare now days in any industry especially comedy!
I loved him in "Back to School" when he would yell at the students, then good old Rodney (no Respect) Dangerfield gave him the answer he was looking for
Hilarious as the Bad Guy in Police Academy.  Loved when he robbed the grocery store and with his Marble Mouth Voice says how he loves shopping at that store.
How did you get the video to emded in the post i keep trying and it won't work
you have to turn it on bottom left  in post options
